languages.text: "Да не полезут они, наученные уже. Давай лучше по банкам постреляем. На спор?"
"They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"
languages.original_text: "Да не полезут они, наученные уже. Давай лучше по банкам постреляем. На спор?"

traits.locale_text: "Nah, they won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"
"Nah, they won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"
"Nah, they won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"
"Nah, they won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"
"They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"
"They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"

languages.text: “他们才不会冒这个险呢，他们已经吸取到教训了。咱们去射点铁罐子玩吧，要不要打个赌？”
languages.original_text: "They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"

traits.locale_text: “得了吧，他们才不会冒这个险呢，他们已经吸取到教训了。咱们去射点铁罐子玩吧，要不要打个赌？”

languages.text: «No volverán a correr el riesgo. Han escarmentado. Vamos a disparar a unas latas. ¿Apostamos algo?».
languages.original_text: "They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"

traits.locale_text: «No, no volverán a correr el riesgo. Han escarmentado. Vamos a disparar a unas latas. ¿Apostamos algo?».

languages.text: 「そんなリスクは冒さないだろ。アレで懲りたはずだ。代わりに缶でも撃ちに行こう。賭けないか？」
languages.original_text: "They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"

traits.locale_text: 「そんなリスクは冒さないだろ。アレで懲りたはずだ。代わりに缶でも撃ちに行こう。賭けないか？」

languages.text: "Das werden sie nicht riskieren, die haben ihre Lektion gelernt. Wir könnten stattdessen auf ein paar Dosen schießen. Wie wär's mit einer Wette?"
languages.original_text: "They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"

traits.locale_text: "Nein, das werden sie nicht riskieren, die haben ihre Lektion gelernt. Wir könnten stattdessen auf ein paar Dosen schießen. Wie wär's mit einer Wette?"

languages.text: « Ils oseront jamais, ils ont retenu la leçon. On n'a qu'à plutôt aller tirer sur des bouteilles. Un petit pari ? »
languages.original_text: "They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"

traits.locale_text: « Non, ils oseront jamais, ils ont retenu la leçon. On n'a qu'à plutôt aller tirer sur des bouteilles. Un petit pari ? »

languages.text: "Bir daha kalkışmazlar, derslerini aldılar. Gidip teneke vuralım hadi. Parasına kapışmaya var mısın?"
languages.original_text: "They won't risk it, they've learned their lesson. Let's go shoot some cans instead. Fancy a wager?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir daha denemezler, derslerini aldılar. Teneke vurmaya gidelim hadi. Bahse var mısın?"
